content: [ARCH] [FAILOVER] Implement parallel connection strategy in AetherCloudClient.ts where all cloud SIDs are connected simultaneously to ensure delivery path redundancy.
[TASK] [BATCHING] Ported packet aggregation for clouds, servers, and access groups in ConnectionWork.ts to reduce network overhead.
[ARCH] [RECOVERY] ConnectionRegistration now exposes public resolveCloud method to support AetherCloudClient's recovery flow[cite: 120].
[TASK] [SYNC] Synchronized makeFirstConnection in TS with Java's parallel connection strategy (Recipient Strategy).
[TASK] [SYNC] Ported parallel connection strategy to TS AetherCloudClient.
[ARCH] [NETWORK] Implemented makeConnectionReg in TS to support multi-registry recovery flow via AFuture.any.
[ARCH] [SYNC] Finalized Adaptive Cloud port: Implemented parallel connections, batched requests, and priority promotion on data receipt.
[DEV] [CLEANUP] Removed duplicate method signatures in ConnectionWork to ensure clean API implementation.
[ARCH] [BATCHING] Finalized TS BMap integration: getCloud now triggers batched server-side resolution.
[LOG] [REFACTOR] Cleaned up legacy Javadoc and method stubs in ConnectionWork.ts and AetherCloudClient.ts.
[ARCH] [PORT-COMPLETE] Aether Cloud TS client is now fully synchronized with Java version.
[ARCH] [STRATEGY] Recipient Strategy implemented: client maintains parallel connections to all servers in the cloud manifest.
[LOG] [BATCHING] Request batching for clouds, servers, and access groups is active in ConnectionWork.flushBackgroundRequests.
[TASK] [HOTFIX] Fixed unterminated Javadoc and reg-exp errors in ConnectionWork.ts caused by overlapping code blocks.
[TASK] [HOTFIX] Successfully removed hidden legacy code blocks (5fzxc-5g045) that were causing TSC syntax errors.
[ARCH] [REGISTRATION] ConnectionRegistration uses GlobalRegServerApi (globalCtx) wrapped in GlobalApiStream for the final registration step, matching Java implementation.
[LOG] Fixed TypeError in resolveCanonicalTypeName by adding typeof check and resolved SyntaxError in declareAnonymType by removing duplicate declaration.
[FIX] Added defensive checks to TypeInfo constructor and resolveCanonicalTypeName to handle non-string anonymous types during API generation pass.
[ARCH] TypeScript generator requires ALL anonymous objects (including streams in method returns/throws) to be registered and replaced by string names during the pre-pass in AetherDslMetaProcessor.
[FIX] Synced anonymous type discovery in API methods with Java logic. All objects in params, returns, and throws are now correctly converted to string names before ApiGenerator runs.
[FIX] Ensuring string replacement of anonymous types in API method definitions. This prevents ApiGenerator from encountering raw objects in returns/throws/params.
[FIX] Modified discoverAnonymousTypesInApi to force in-place replacement of objects with string names in the metadata structure, preventing ApiGenerator from failing on included DSL files.
[LOG] Added conditional generation of EMPTY constant for TypeScript APIs with no methods and no parents.
[ARCH] [TS-PORT] В TypeScript UUID должен приводиться к строке .toString() при использовании в качестве ключа Map, иначе сравнение идет по ссылке объекта.
[LOG] [TS-FIX] Восстановлен баланс скобок в ConnectionWork после неудачного рефакторинга flush.
[LOG] [REPAIR] Исправлен критический разбаланс скобок в ConnectionWork. Удален дублирующийся блок cancel.
[ARCH] [TS-PORT] Методы toApi в MessageNode разделены на toApiWithCtx и toApiWithFactory для избежания конфликтов перегрузки в TS.
[ARCH] [TS-PORT] Исправлено наслоение кода в ConnectionWork. Переменные flush теперь уникальны.
[ARCH] [TS-PORT] Replaced overloaded toApi with named methods: toApiWithCtx and toApiWithFactory.
[ARCH] [TS-PORT] Метод flush в ConnectionWork разделен на сбор фоновых запросов и выполнение задач AuthorizedApi.
[ARCH] [TS-PORT] FastApiContext.flush in TypeScript requires a FlushReport object (e.g., FlushReport.STUB) instead of a callback function.
[ARCH] [TS-PORT] Конструктор Connection использует client: any для обхода циклической зависимости Client-Connection.
[LOG] [REPAIR] IDs in ConnectionWork shifted to 5xc... prefix after manual sync. Re-aligned all pointers.
[ARCH] [TS-FIX] В TS-колбэках удаляйте только выражения, сохраняя структуру скобок }) для корректной валидации.
[ARCH] [TS-FIX] ConnectionWork успешно очищен от наслоений. Переменные flush и колбэки кэша приведены к единичному объявлению.
